text: @realDonaldTrump Aside from the fact that Flynn admitted to his guilt by doing that thing called "pleading guilty," which means you're saying you'll pardon one of your guilty flunkies, we have a coronavirus crisis going on and you're causing more infections and deaths through your incompetence.
